_header: To the shepherds keeping their fold
_description: James Ryman, a Nativity carol — seven quatrains (aaab) and burden (cc): ‘In terra pax hominibus / Quia natus est dominus’

CULEe112.First Lines:
To the Shepeherdes keping their foldeThat crist was borne an
                    Aungell tolde…
CULEe112.Last Lines:
…Another way no dought to makeReuersi sunt cum
                    gaudio

Zupitza,  Julius,
